argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fvmptmap.1 | |- C e. _V |
| 2 |  | fvmptmap.2 | |- D e. _V |
| 3 |  | fvmptmap.3 | |- R e. _V |
| 4 |  | fvmptmap.4 | |- ( x = A -> B = C ) |
| 5 |  | fvmptmap.5 | |- F = ( x e. ( R ^m D ) |-> B ) |
| 6 | 3, 2 | #P_elmap | |- ( A e. ( R ^m D ) <-> A : D --> R ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 1 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( A e. ( R ^m D ) -> ( F ` A ) = C ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylbir | |- ( A : D --> R -> ( F ` A ) = C ) |
